reviewText: I was hoping to find a video that might provide an interesting exerpt or two for my high school world history class, but this doesn't do  it. The presentation is disjointed with the camera work and commentary sometimes out of sync , creating confusion. For clarity, I believe we ought to be allowed to look at the art work while the commentator is discussing certain features. I can remember several places where the commentator drew my attention to something in a painting while the camera had gone on to picture something else. You really have to already know quite a bit about the artists and the city  to be able to follow this.
